module.name: Weak Password Detection
module.changelog: *2.8.0.0* #4309 *2.7.0.0* spelling, localizations *2.6.0.1* #3735 *2.6.0.0* misc *2.5.0.3* #3663 *2.5.0.2* changes to warning msg, moved to Tools tab, System Administration *2.5.0.1* Consolidated individual security notices to a single notice with all details in extended text *2.5.0.0* Initial release
module.description: This module detects weak SIP secrets and sets security notifications accordingly
